pages.text: $(item)Brooms$() are magical devices commonly by witches. Through the use of ME, they enable the user to fly through the skies.$(br2)Brooms come in four variants, each with unique properties.used dismounting brings you and the broom back to the starting point
$(item)Juniper Brooms$() are the fastest of all brooms, without any other special properties.
$(item)Cypress Brooms$() ward the user, reducing both damage input and output.
$(item)Elder Brooms$() will return the user to where they mounted it after dismounting.
$(item)Dragon's Blood Brooms$() can have active Sigils applied to them, much like any other Dragon's Blood block.
